sentences.sContent: The company produces chemicals that destroy ticks and mites.
sentences.sCn: 该公司生产消灭壁虱和螨虫的化学品。

phrases.pCn: [口语]一会儿，一刹那间，一转眼间

remMethod.val: 验票员在票 (ticket) 上做记号 (tick)

words.tran: 滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器
坚质条纹棉布或亚麻布；（指钟表发出的）滴答响声

trans.tranOther: A tick is a small creature which lives on the bodies of people or animals and uses their blood as food
